alert.note: Alert for Willapa Hills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 30 at 8:46PM PDT until April 02 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM FRIDAY TO 5 PM PDT SUNDAY ABOVE 2000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 2000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Willapa Hills. * WHEN...From 5 PM Friday to 5 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing snow will result in reduced visibilities.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
